statements: SELECT * FROM chatbot_interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM chatbot_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, message FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE feedback = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_date, customer_id, message FROM chatbot_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 10;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE customer_id = 200 AND feedback = TRUE;
SELECT interaction_id, message FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2021-01-01' AND interaction_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT interaction_id, feedback FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY interaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT interaction_id, message FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(interaction_date) AS latest_interaction_date FROM interactions;
SELECT content_type, content_text FROM marketing_content WHERE content_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, DATE_FORMAT(interaction_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND customer_id = 456;
SELECT content_id, content_text FROM marketing_content WHERE content_type = 'Campaign' AND creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, message FROM interactions WHERE message LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM marketing_content WHERE release_date = '2023-01-01'
SELECT preference_id, customer_id, preference_type FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY preference_type ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_content FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_type, release_date FROM marketing_content WHERE content_type = 'Promotion';
SELECT customer_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_type = 'Email';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_content FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ChatMessage ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC;
SELECT content_text, content_type FROM MarketingContent;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_phone = '+123456789';
SELECT c.customer_name, m.message_text, mc.content_type FROM Customer c JOIN ChatMessage m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id JOIN MarketingContent mc ON m.message_id = mc.content_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, m.message_text, il.log_timestamp FROM Customer c JOIN ChatMessage m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id JOIN InteractionLog il ON m.message_id = il.message_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM ChatMessage;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT content_id, content_type, content_date FROM MarketingContent WHERE content_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT session_id, bot_id, session_start, session_end FROM BotSessions WHERE bot_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_notes FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT content_type, content_date FROM MarketingContent WHERE content_type IN ('News','Promotion') ORDER BY content_date ASC;
SELECT session_id, session_start, session_end FROM BotSessions WHERE bot_id = 1 AND session_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM BotResponses WHERE session_id = 100 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
